title: WHAT FONT IS THIS
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011035im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/RUN%20TMC_5633.jpg)

Warriors

 [‹ Which font?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011035/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48226 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font from Obama Poster ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011035/http:/www.typophile.com/node/48232 "Go to next forum topic")
author: airchi

comments.content: The typeface on the back of the jersey is [Player](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011035/http:/www.identifont.com/find?similar=player&q=Go)

I would say front is probably custom (I can’t really see)... but you could try something like Giza... [heres a few alernatives](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011035/http:/www.identifont.com/find?similar=giza&q=Go)... Just have a search!
